ValidationRule.description: The group plan sponsor for HPHC lead must be FULLY INSURED
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: And( ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c , "Harvard Pilgrim Health Care"), Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "FULLY INSURED", Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "Call Request" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The group plan sponsor for Harvard Pilgrim Health Care leads must be FULLY INSURED
